A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Adam Driver was excellent. Three to four of the scenes were great\, or excellent. But most of the movie's narrative was hollow and inconsistent. There were long periods where I was bored. I didn't care about the characters\, or what happened to them. The narrative didn't get me to emotionally invest in them. I didn't really care if they got what they wanted or needed. It's the first StarWars movie I've ever seen where afterward\, I thought\, \"That was okay\, but I'm not sure I would watch it again.\" The movie could have been a very awesome 30-45 minute short.
